build.command: rm -rf */migrations/0*.py && python manage.py makemigrations authentication && python manage.py makemigrations core && python manage.py makemigrations posts && python manage.py makemigrations jobs && python manage.py makemigrations profiles && python manage.py makemigrations dashboard && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py create_admin && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
